annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: ΕΝ
annotations.translation: 英语

annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: Official Journal of the European Communities
annotations.translation: 欧洲共同体官方公报

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. Articles 3 to 10 shall be replaced by the following:
annotations.translation: 2. 第 3 条至第 10 条应替换为以下内容：

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: ' Article 3
annotations.translation: “第 3 条

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Medicinal products for human use covered by the procedures laid down in Regulation (EEC) No 2309/93
annotations.translation: (EEC) 第 2309/93 号条例规定的程序所涵盖的供人类使用的药品

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. Authorisation to market a medicinal product
annotations.translation: 1. 药品上市许可

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) Full fee
annotations.translation: (a) 全额费用

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The fee for an application for authorisation to market a medicinal product supported by a full dossier is ECU 200 000. This fee covers a single strength associated with one pharmaceutical form.
annotations.translation: 由完整档案支持的药品上市许可的申请费为 ECU200,000，该费用涵盖与一种药物剂型相关的单一规格。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The fee shall be increased by ECU 20 000 for each additional strength and/or pharmaceutical form submitted at the same time as the initial application for authorisation. This increase covers one additional strength and/or pharmaceutical form.
annotations.translation: 对于在初次申请许可时提交的每个额外规格和/或药物剂型，费用应增加 ECU20,000。所增加的费用涵盖了一种额外的规格和/或药物剂型。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The fee shall be increased by ECU 5 000 for each additional presentation of the same strength and pharmaceutical form, submitted at the same time as the initial application for authorisation.
annotations.translation: 对于在初次申请许可时提交的相同规格和药物剂型的每份额外推介材料，费用相应增加 ECU5000。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) Reduced fee
annotations.translation: (b) 减免费用

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: A reduced fee of ECU 100 000 shall apply to applications for authorisation to market a medicinal product for which a full dossier need not be presented, as provided for in Article 4 of the third paragraph of point 8(a)(i) and (iii) of Directive 65/65/EEC or when recourse is had to point 8(a)(ii) of the third paragraph of Article 4 of the same Directive. This fee covers a single strength associated with one pharmaceutical form.
annotations.translation: 根据第 65/65/EEC 号指令第 4 条第 8(a)(i) 和 (iii) 点第三段的规定， 或当必须诉诸同一指令第 4 条第三段第 8(a)(ii) 点时，无需提交完整档案的药品上市许可申请，即可减免 ECU100,000 的费用。该费用涵盖与一种药物剂型相关的单一规格。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The fee shall be increased by ECU 20 000 for each additional strength and/or pharmaceutical form submitted at the same time as the initial application for authorisation. This increase covers one additional strength and/or pharmaceutical form.
annotations.translation: 对于与初次申请许可同时提交的每一个额外规格和/或剂型，费用应增加 ECU20,000。所增加的费用涵盖了一种额外的规格和/或药物剂型。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The fee shall be increased by ECU 5 000 for each additional presentation of the same strength and pharmaceutical form submitted at the same time as the initial application for authorisation.
annotations.translation: 对于在初次申请许可时提交的相同规格和药物剂型的每份额外推介材料，费用相应增加 ECU5000。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (c) Extension fee
annotations.translation: (c) 延期费

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: This is the fee for each extension of a marketing authorisation which has already been granted:
annotations.translation: 这是已授予的上市许可每次延期的费用：

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: where the extension is for a new strength, a new pharmaceutical form, a new indication or a new method of administration, the fee shall be ECU 50 000,
annotations.translation: 如果延期涉及新的规格、新的药物剂型、新的适应症或新的给药方法，则费用应为 ECU50,000，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: where the extension is for a new presentation of a strength, a pharmaceutical form or of a method of administration which are already authorised, the fee shall be ECU 10 000.
annotations.translation: 如果延期涉及对已经获得许可的规格、药物剂型或给药方法给出新的推介材料，则费用应为 ECU10,000。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. Variation
annotations.translation: 2. 变更

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) Type I variation fee
annotations.translation: (a) 第一类变更费用

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The fee for a variation of minor importance to a marketing authorisation according to the classification established by the Commission Regulation applicable to the matter shall be ECU 5 000.
annotations.translation: 根据适用于该事项的委员会条例规定的分类，对上市许可进行轻微变更的费用应为 ECU5000。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: In the event of the same variation being introduced, this fee shall cover all authorised strengths, pharmaceutical forms and presentations.
annotations.translation: 如引入相同的变更，则该费用应涵盖所有获得许可的剂量、药物剂型和推介材料。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) Type II variation fee
annotations.translation: (b) 第二类变更费用

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The fee for a variation of major importance to a marketing authorisation according to the classification established by the Commission Regulation applicable to the matter shall be ECU 60 000. It may be halved for certain Type II variations which do not involve detailed scientific evaluation, a list of which shall be drawn up in accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 11(2).
annotations.translation: 根据适用于该事项的委员会条例规定的分类，对上市许可进行重要变更的费用应为 ECU60,000。对于不涉及详细科学评估的某些第二类变更，费用可以减半，应根据第 11(2) 条规定的程序制定变更清单。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: In the event of the same variation being introduced, this fee shall cover all authorised strengths, pharmaceutical forms and presentations.
annotations.translation: 如引入相同的变更，则该费用应涵盖所有获得许可的剂量、药物剂型和推介材料。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 3. Renewal fee
annotations.translation: 3. 更新费

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The fee for examining information available at the time of the five-yearly renewal of an authorisation to market a medicinal product shall be ECU 10 000. It shall be charged for each strength associated with a pharmaceutical form.
annotations.translation: 每五年更新一次药品上市许可时，审查现有信息的费用应为 ECU10,000。与药物剂型相关的每种剂量都应收取费用。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 4. Inspection fee
annotations.translation: 4. 检查费

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: The flat-rate fee for any inspection within or outside the Community is ECU 15 000. For inspections outside the Community, travel expenses shall be charged extra on the basis of actual cost.
annotations.translation: 在共同体内部或之外进行检查的统一收费是 ECU15,000。在共同体外检查时，按实际成本加收差旅费。
